title: Longest game you ever played?
body:
i just had a 1hr 21min game lol, was crazy!

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/70463398/200314395?tab=stats

what is longest you guys have done

{{champion:42}}

replies.body:
My friends had an 87 minute game once... one team had Teemo and the other team couldn't push past the shrooms inside Teemo's base for ages, about a good 40 minutes probably.

Personally, my longest game would probably be a normal hour long game, since one team or the other would throw.
2ish hours in the one for all mirror mode as all {{champion:30}}. Legit so boring, finally the game ended when some people starting building AD.

> 2ish hours in the one for all mirror mode as all {{champion:30}}. Legit so boring, finally the game ended when some people starting building AD.

AD Karthus OP
my longest game 78 minutes mostly a ping pong game, until someone had the bright idea to get baron and we lost since our support did not ward it :(

You know its a long game, when you upgrade your trinkets.... Kappa
Longest game for me is probs like 1:40 Hrs, was carrying as Kat until spotted by a ward and R.I.P game.

The longest game I have ever played was around the 75:00 minute mark. This was back in season 3 I think. It gets crazy that late into a game, because the next teamfight determines the game pretty much.
